comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: This seems likely to be Columbia University commencement on June 4, 1913. According to NYT, the following day query.nytimes.com/gst/abstract.html?res=9E01E0D81F3AE633A... Gorgas (adjoining picture) received an honorary degree that day.

comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: Carrel got an honorary degree the same day.

comment.author: 34904489@N07
comment._content: swanq and rjones0856: Thanks for the info!  All signs do point to this being Columbia University's commencement on June 4, 1913, with honorary degree recipient Dr. Alexis Carrel in the center of the group.  When we update the record, we will add more of these details. Thanks again for your comments!

comment.author: 70251312@N00
comment._content: Photo is dated 6/4/13. LOC -- This photo is mislabeled. These are Columbia Alumni, but not the "polo" team. A different photo in the series shows a fake alumni "polo" team: www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/3389736913/in/p...

comment.author: 33593953@N02
comment._content: Wystan: Thanks for pointing out the mislabeling.  It appears that there was an errant ditto mark on the card the caption was keyed from.  We'll remove the polo team reference when we update.
